attributes.action: get the awsome dance act, Base Invaders... a record deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Base Invaders have a massive online following however have not got a record deal and cannot afford to get vinyl made for all the DJs that request it. Lets get a record deal struck!

see: www.myspace.com/baseinvaders

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
